definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Scented tea is made by adding fragrant flowers to high-quality green tea.
sentences.chinese: 香片是由高級綠茶加香花製成的。

sentences.english: Jia trinity thought let li guess marry small treasure, yellow fragrant flower let him go to ask guess.
sentences.chinese: 賈三一心想讓李猜猜嫁給小寶，黃香花讓他去問猜猜。

sentences.english: A few yards away, the lilacs hung heavy in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 幾碼遠外，丁香花在雨裏沉甸甸地掛在枝上。

sentences.english: The air was filled with the scent of lilac .
sentences.chinese: 空氣中瀰漫着丁香花的芬芳。

sentences.english: When they gave the donkey flowers to smell, it ate them.
sentences.chinese: 給蠢驢聞香花，它只會一口把它吞下。

sentences.english: I gave her a bunch of lilac.
We must distinguish good and bad literary works.
sentences.chinese: 我們要分清楚文藝作品中香花與毒草。

sentences.english: When I look at this picture, I can almost smell the lilacs .
sentences.chinese: 當我看這張照片的時候，幾乎可以聞到丁香花的味道。

sentences.english: He may pitch on some tuft of lilacs over a river.
sentences.chinese: 他可以到小河邊去採摘一簇丁香花。

sentences.english: And hear the thrushes singing in the lilacs round the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 我聽到草地邊丁香花叢中，畫眉在歌唱。

sentences.english: Xianghualing alkali-feldspathic granite is a composite rock mass.
sentences.chinese: 香花嶺鹼長花崗岩爲一複式巖體。

sentences.english: This video shows you what you can do against her from Xianghua's point of view.
sentences.chinese: 該視頻顯示，你可以對她做香花的觀點。
花園裏的丁香花確實需要除除草了。

sentences.english: Compared with Madana, TYA is more younger , more beautiful and more sexy.
sentences.chinese: 同麥丹娜相比，丁香花更年輕，更漂亮，更性感。

sentences.english: Lilac is best used as a garnish.
sentences.chinese: 丁香花最好是用作配菜。

sentences.english: Until then, lilacs bloom every spring.
sentences.chinese: 丁香花每年春天都綻放。

definition: strongly fragrant/heavily scented/same as 香馥馥[xiang1 fu4 fu4]
lit. orchids and musk/fig. sweet perfumes
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
